review: I had visited Oraa Dental Care in Ramphal Chowk, Sector -7 New Delhi. I am happy I chose this clinic for Braces and was taken care of by Dr. Pankaj and Dr. Akanksha, and Dr. Dhruv. thoroughly happy with the service and also got desired result. highly recommend getting any teeth related services done at minimalist cost and maximum care. :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I landed here after reading reviews here and on practo. I took treatment for cross teeth for my son. Dr Akansha is a very humble person and ensured that child is comfortable with her. As this was his first dentist visit / treatment I was lil skeptical initially. But the moment I met her, she explained about the problem and advised treatment accordingly. She ensured that she explains the problem in detail and answers all queries. She gave remarkable results for my son way before the speculates time. Her clinic follow up is way beyond your expectations. I am extremely happy with the results and would highly recommend Dr Akansha for any pediatric treatment.

tags: None
review:
Dr Akanksha Tokas treated my 4 yr old son very well. She is highly recommended. She not only focuses on treatment part but also stresses upon preventive treatment. She did preventive fluoride treatment for my son along with multiple fillings and cleaning. She is very knowledgeable and friendly with kids. She made whole experience very smooth. She explained us each and every step of the treatment procedures Earlier my son was fearful of dentist but now he is very comfortable. His fear just vanished.
Thanks Doctor üôÇ

tags: None
review:
I got my 5 year old daughter's root canal, capping and fillings done from Dr Akanksha Tokas. She is very patient and kind. She not only treated my daughter but also gave counseling for diet. She demonstrated brushing method. She explained us x-rays and made us understand the importance of milk teeth and why we should save them. We were not aware of this before. Our earlier dentist never informed us about treatments options for milk teeth. We were told to wait until permanent teeth erupts. My child was in pain and was not able to eat properly.
I am so thankful to you doctor. She is highly recommended!!
